meanings.definition: Not influenced by personal feelings or opinions; unbiased.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted an objective experiment to ensure unbiased results.
meanings.sent2: It is important to remain objective when making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The objective judge made a fair ruling in the competition.
meanings.sent4: Her objective viewpoint helped to resolve the conflict peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The detective approached the case with an objective mindset to uncover the truth.

meanings.definition: A goal or purpose that is not influenced by personal feelings or opinions.
meanings.sent1: His objective is to finish the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: Setting clear objectives can help you stay focused on your goals.
meanings.sent3: The team's objective was to score the winning goal in the match.
meanings.sent4: Her objective in life is to make a positive impact on others.
meanings.sent5: The company's main objective is to provide excellent customer service.
